addition.34: "Cannot add self-loop edge on node %s, as self-loops are not allowed.";
addition.38: "The endpoints' directedness (isDirected = %s) does not match the graph's directedness "
addition.39: + "(isDirected = %s). A graph cannot have both directed and undirected edges.";

removed.34: "Can't add self-loop edge on node %s, as self-loops are not allowed.";
removed.36: "Cannot call source()/target() on an undirected graph. "
removed.37: + "Consider using incidentNodes() (if you don't know either incident node) "
removed.38: + "or Graphs.oppositeNode() (if you know one of the incident nodes).";
